Āyatana Sutta：1．āyatana Sutta．-Once when the Buddha was staying in the Kūtāgarasālā in Vesāli，he preached to the monks a sermon on the six spheres of contact （salāyatana）．The monks listened with rapt attention until Māra，making a terrible din，disturbed their peace of mind．The Buddha admonished the monks not to be led away by Māra，and the latter，discomfited，disappeared （S．i．112）．

2．āyatana Sutta．-The four Ariyan truths are concerned with the six personal spheres of sense．Effort should be made to realise this．S．v．426．
